api_list.name: Get Device-Asset by Identifier_copy
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://basic-info-vikkon-assets.p.rapidapi.com/apivikkon-sandbox.herokuapp.com/api/v1/external-system/71491234-A"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "basic-info-vikkon-assets.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
